text: Ojo ʙaroi on kasone, ki imon ʙa Alloh va rasulas ovardaand, vaqti on narasidaast, ki dilhojason dar ʙaroʙari jodi Alloh va sunidani suxani haq (Qur'on), ki nozil sudaast, narm gardad? Va niz monandi kasone (ja'ne, jahudu nasoro) naʙosand, ki pes az in Qur'on ʙa onho kitoʙ doda sudaaast va ruzgor ʙar onho daroz omad, kalomi Allohro taʙdil dodand, ongoh dilhojason saxt sud va ʙisjore az onho fosiqonand
